Features.aboutUsParagraph: We see technology not merely as a tool but as a guide that will shed light on our country's future.
Features.communityTitle: A dynamic community of technology enthusiasts
Features.communityParagraph: We organize weekly events, workshops, and social gatherings to develop ourselves and have fun. Would you like to be part of this energetic community?

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.description: We are a community of developers, innovators, and tech enthusiasts working together to create meaningful impact through technology.

community.title: Our Community
community.description: Google Developer Groups on Campus (GDG on Campus) is a global ecosystem based on Google, comprising over 250,000 members in more than 2,100 clubs across 100+ countries. As a club, our goal is to gain learning experiences with our peers in fields like cybersecurity, AI, game programming, Android, web development, or Cloud with Google’s support, and to present our exemplary works and solutions to local communities.

joinUs.title: Join Us!
joinUs.description: As GDG on Campus - Istanbul University-Cerrahpasa branch, we provide IUC students with opportunities to participate in global GDG events and offer workshops, technical tours, teatalks, and training sessions for personal development. Thanks to the GDG platform used by GDG members worldwide, all our events at our university will be announced, showcasing our visibility and activity on international platforms.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To foster a collaborative environment where developers can learn, share, and grow together. We aim to make technology accessible and create opportunities for everyone in the tech community.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading platform for technological innovation and learning, where ideas transform into impactful solutions that shape the future of technology.

hero.title: Our Events
hero.description: Explore the events we organize at Istanbul University-Cerrahpaşa.

monthlyActivities.description: In addition to our main events, we plan to host four activities every month...
